exclusion.criterion: History of systemic diseases, that alter bone metabolism (osteoporosis, diabetes mellitus)

exclusion.criterion: History of medication known to alter bone remodelling (bisphosphonates, RANK ligand inhibitor monoclonal antibodies, corticosteroids)

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis and CSF leak with meningitis, but these conditions are not explicitly mentioned in the exclusion criteria.
